query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN notificationDaysAdvance INT DEFAULT 3 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN enableInAppNotifications TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN enableEmailNotifications TINYINT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN enableDailySummaryEmail TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN dailySummaryTime VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT '08:00';
